sources.title: 1933 Fräulein Hoffmanns Erzählungen( Anny Ondra, Paul Otto, Ida Wüst, Mathias Wiemann)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1933. Fräulein hoffmanns Erzählungen  U.a mit Ida Wüst und Matthias Wiemann

metadata.Plot: Miss Anita Liman is the sole owner of a coffee importing company, with offices in Hamburg, Genoa and Santiago. Anita's first competitor Benno Karden would merry her purely for business reasons, but he falls in love with her. Benno has not realized that his lover is a smart competitor. Complications follow.
metadata.Actors: Anny Ondra, Mathias Wieman, Ida Wüst
